00011 #include <pob-eye.h>
00012 #include "pad.h"
00013 
00014 // external functions declarations (for PrintTextOnPobLCD)
00015 extern void InitAsciiBuffer();
00016 extern void PrintTextOnPobLCD(int row, int col, char *string, UInt8 *Screen_Buffer);
00017 
00018 int     main(void)
00019 {       
00020         //variable declaration (128 is the center of the LCD screen)
00021         UInt8 top_bottom_axe = 128;
00022         UInt8 right_left_axe = 128;
00023         int button = 0;
00024         char top_bottom[10]; 
00025         char right_left[10];
00026 
00027         //This buffers will store the pixels to display, 
00028         GraphicBuffer           LCD_Buffer_Video;
00029         UInt8                                   LCD_Buffer[LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT*BITS];
00030         UInt8                                   ASCII_Buffer[LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT*BITS];  // Buffer to stock the ascii table in bitmap format
00031 
00032         //Initialize POB-EYE (lib), POB-LCD (lib) and POB-PROTO(source code at end of this file)
00033         InitPOBEYE();
00034         InitLCD();                      
00035         InitPobProto();
00036 
00037         // Initialize the Graphic buffer with 128 per 64, one pixel per bit and LCD_Buffer
00038         InitGraphicBuffer( &LCD_Buffer_Video, LCD_WIDTH,LCD_HEIGHT,ONE_BIT,LCD_Buffer);
00039 
00040         //Clear and draw the buffer to make clean the screen
00041         ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00042         DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00043         
00044         // Init Ascii buffer, use to write in the LCD screen with PrintTextOnPobLCD function
00045         InitAsciiBuffer(); 
00046 
00047         while (1)
00048         {               
00049                 //get the values of pad
00050                 top_bottom_axe = GetPortAnalog(UP_DOWN_AXE);
00051                 right_left_axe = GetPortAnalog(RIGHT_LEFT_AXE);
00052                 button = GetPortAnalog(BUTTON);
00053 
00054                 if (button >=100)
00055                 {
00056                                 ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00057                                 //convert it from int to char*
00058                                 sprintf(top_bottom, "%d", top_bottom_axe); 
00059                                 sprintf(right_left, "%d", right_left_axe);
00060 
00061                                 //Display values
00062                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(1, 2, "Top", LCD_Buffer);
00063                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(2, 1, "Bottom", LCD_Buffer);
00064                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(5, 3, top_bottom, LCD_Buffer);
00065                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(1, 8, "Right", LCD_Buffer);
00066                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(2, 8, "Left", LCD_Buffer);
00067                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(5, 8, right_left, LCD_Buffer);
00068                                 DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00069                 }
00070                 // If button is pressed
00071                 if (button < 100)
00072                 {
00073                                 ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00074                                 DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00075                                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(4, 1, "Button pressed", LCD_Buffer);
00076                                 DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00077                                 Wait(1000000);
00078                                 ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00079                                 DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 return 0;       
00083 }
